website_summaries.verdict: If you have very curly hair or coils, this gel defines, holds, and adds moisture. Works well for these hair types in most humid conditions, too.
pros: Formulated with polymers and plant-based oils for an ultra-moisturizing effect
Great for tight curls and coils, and dry hair
Tames frizz and doesn't leave hair feeling crunchy
cons: Not the best pick for waves and loose curls, as it can weigh them down and leave hair looking oily
Some users report flakes after using it

customer_reviews.title: Shine and soft curls!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and used only once. It doesn’t take much to make your curls soft and defined so make sure you do not over use. With this product I can eliminate the oi oil for shine for it has this in it. I do love that! So far I like it and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Helms

customer_reviews.title: Not good for natural curls
customer_reviews.text: Hated this product. I have naturally curly hair and was excited to try this, but it was so awful that I had to rewash my hair. Rather than leaving my curly hair in locks, it all separated into crunchy waves. Looked like I walked straight out of a 90's movie.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Keehner

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Product doesn't work it melts off your hair. It smells like cheap air freshener and its sticky. I send a request to return in and they send me a new one at "no cost" that I didn't request. They are now charging me for it. I will never even consider purchasing anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: The best gel for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: There's a ton of humidity where I live, a tiny bit of this can keep my big head of hair way under control. The best gel I've used. My hair is unstylable (it's so curly that I have to put so much gel in that it feels like it could snap off), but this is great at locking in mositure and letting my hair just do it's natural thing
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: stickey
customer_reviews.text: This product was not good on my hair. If you use a small amount it did not hold my curls, and if you use to much it is sticky and heavy. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Hess

customer_reviews.title: Best hair gel for my curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many gels for my hair and this is the best by far! I have fine but super curly hair and I wanted a gel that is light enough that it won’t drag the curls down but also create distinct shiny curls. Think of Shirley Temple curls. This gel makes my curls bouncy and shiny and I always get compliments
customer_reviews.author: E Rob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair greasy. When I use this product I have to wash my hair more frequently which is not recommended for curly hair. Don’t help as much as other products for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.author: kari mcnair

customer_reviews.title: Good for curls w/frizz
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but not so fond of the two but as I was the tub that it used to come in . Helps with my curls and to ease my frizz
customer_reviews.author: Ahen

customer_reviews.title: Natural waves.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that really Keeps my hair from frizzing. I also like that it doesn’t make your hair stiff like a lot of other gels, it puts a nice wave without that “crunched” up look.
customer_reviews.author: mezzaluna508

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand but was not happy with this product. I live in Texas and deal with a lot of humidity. It didn’t really do what it said it was going to do. I have wavy frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Eleana Guinn

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this product due to the price, but I went ahead and decided to get it anyway, and WOW was it a disappointment. The package claims "ringlets to corkscrews," I can attest that that is a total lie, as for the frizz protection, the benefit is minimal at best. This product dried out my hair, and I would not use it again if it was free.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product for a soft curl with definition. It works for wet and dry hair. It’s pricey.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie berry

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and item as described- love this hair gel- this seller is great- others selling the same item are charging way too much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy k

customer_reviews.title: Not for naturally curly hair.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible for naturally curly hair. It might work for kinky hair. The product is very heavy and leaves your hair looking not soft nor shiny but greasy and stringy. The product is very thick and might work only if you have coarse hair.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Not for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike. It was too sticky and it left my natural hair hard. These ad referrals are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks very healthy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on very humidity weather makes my curls look perfect
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisturizing ability of this and it’s a gel too. The invention of this was ingenious. It does dry out my hair and tames the frizzies.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Palache

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: The product did not control Florida humidity frizz. Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after formula change
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed since they changed the formula. I LOVED the product in the tub, but the new formula in the bottle is awful. Dries out my hair and makes it more frizzy. Please change it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my curly hair. It is expensive and should of worked better. Left me with more a a frizz then a curl. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bb curl rocks
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the humid days that made my hair dry & frizzy & this product helped keep its curl. Looks better 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Aoife

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product, expensive
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works like this product on my hair. Love it, although this smaller package redesign co rains less product for more money, is a rip off
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, curly hair girls have tried everything! Even purchased for a friends daughter who has curly hair and struggles.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for curly hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever for curly hair! I read some of the negative reviews and would suggest to them to add just a splash of water to product to slightly thin it before applying to your hair. Not too much ptoduct or it will weigh hair down. Yes it is expensive but it will last if used properly. I have used so many different products for curly hair and this is by far the very best!! And I have super curly hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a recommendation from a fellow curly girl. I only realized I really had curly hair till about 7 months ago or so. This product helps my frizz from being too much. I still have some frizz but it’s better with this product. It smells amazing and I love the consistency of it being both a gel and oil. My hair feels nourished and soft with this also.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: A Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product does not live up to what it says it will do. No way did this gel help calm my frizzy hair. It actually made my hair worse. A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: B&B is so good
customer_reviews.text: Not just for curls! I put it on my towel-dried pixie. Gives a nice messy scrunchy look and lasts all day. Nice scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin and Pie

customer_reviews.title: Curls!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I’ve got beautiful curls now and no more stringy, frizzy hair. Holds my curls in place for 3 days or longer.
customer_reviews.author: L Ragazzo

customer_reviews.title: Love this gel oil
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oil gel for several years;it works well with my moderately thick yet fine hair. I haven’t found anything else that compares..
customer_reviews.author: Dee

product_meta.title: Bumble and Bumble Bb.Curl Anti-Humidity Gel-Oil 5oz
product_meta.description: What it is: A frizz-fighting gel that combines the hold of a gel with the hydration of an oil. Hair Type: Curly and Coily Hair Texture: Medium and Thick Hair Concerns: Dryness, Shine, and Frizz Formulation: Gel Highlighted Ingredients: - HydraSculpt Blend: A cross-linking polymer that blends styling benefits with moisturization so that each curl is controlled and hydrated. - Oil Blend: A hydrating mix of Cupuacu Butter and nourishing oils, including Babassu Oil and Pracaxi Oil. - Rich Moisture Mix: A blend of humectants that help provide moisturizing benefits. Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, mineral oils, and phthalates. Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand and doesn’t test on animals. What Else You Need to Know: Bumble and bumble’s Bb. Curl (Style) Anti-Humidity Gel-Oil hybrid is formulated with an oil blend to help moisturize and hydrate hair for elongated curls and shine. It’s best used for healthy, dry, damaged, and chemically treated hair.
